A former bank robber, Charlie Bronson (Dax Shepard), who lives in a small California town with his girlfriend, Annie (Kristen Bell), decides to leave the witness protection program to help you achieve your dream job in Los Angeles. But the meddling ex-boyfriend of Annie (Michael Rosenbaum) sends former accomplices Charlie (led by Bradley Cooper) and a federal police disrupted (Tom Arnold) to a thrilling chase. A pleasure trip soon turns into a rough, comic chaos at high speed.
